text: Sun Country Airlines is an American low-fare airline. It was started by many former Braniff International Airways employees. It is headquartered in the Dakota County suburb of Eagan, Minnesota. Sun Country uses nearby Minneapolis/Saint Paul International Airport as a hub. It currently flies to 43 destinations throughout the Caribbean, United States, Mexico, and Costa Rica. Most of Sun Country's routes either arrive in or depart from Minneapolis-St. Paul. The airline also sometimes has flights between other cities, including Dallas, Texas Sun Country has Boeing 737 airplanes. ==References== Category:Airlines of the United States Category:Low-cost airlines Category:Companies based in Minnesota Category:1982 establishments in the United States
title: Sun Country Airlines
